biography: Kristian is a golfer known for his meticulous approach to the game. Representing Master Golf Club, Kristian brings a calculated and thoughtful presence to the course. He is admired by his peers for his calm demeanor and strategic thinking.

Kristian has participated in the Hector Trophée on three occasions, showcasing his commitment to this esteemed tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Kristian's dedication remains unwavering. He is always a threat to make a deep run.

Although Kristian will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his presence will be missed. There remains the possibility of a last-minute entry, and fans are hopeful he will make an appearance.
